com.netflix.servo.stats

Class StatsConfig.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.servo.stats.StatsConfig.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    StatsConfig

    public static class StatsConfig.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder for StatsConfig. By default the configuration includes count, total and 95th and 99th percentiles.
